books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A search for stolen rare manuscripts leads to a Florida island.
books.name: CAMINO ISLAND

books.author: by Janet Evanovich
books.description: Emerson Knight, an eccentric millionaire, and Riley Moon, a financial analyst, search for a missing island.
books.name: DANGEROUS MINDS

books.author: by Dean Koontz
books.description: An F.B.I. agent investigates an alarming surge in suicides, including her husband's.
books.name: THE SILENT CORNER

books.author: by Elin Hilderbrand
books.description: Complications in the lives of identical twins who were raised by their divorced parents, one on Nantucket, one on Martha’s Vineyard.
books.name: THE IDENTICALS

books.author: by Margaret Atwood
books.description: In a dystopian future, men and women perform the services assigned to them. Originally published in 1986.
books.name: THE HANDMAID'S TALE

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: Years after she was kidnapped, a woman returns to her family’s Montana ranch.
books.name: COME SUNDOWN

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: In this psychological thriller by the author of “The Girl on the Train,” the bodies of drowned women are found in an English river town.
books.name: INTO THE WATER

books.author: by Ruth Ware
books.description: A travel writer on a cruise is certain she has heard a body thrown overboard, but no one believes her.
books.name: THE WOMAN IN CABIN 10

books.author: by Mary Alice Monroe
books.description: A woman who has rented out her South Carolina beach house for the summer winds up sharing it with her tenant when she is faced with a tragedy.
books.name: BEACH HOUSE FOR RENT

books.author: by Rupi Kaur
books.description: Poetic approaches to surviving adversity and loss.
books.name: MILK AND HONEY

books.author: by Adriana Trigiani
books.description: Extended Italian-American families work, feud and fall in love in the Philadelphia area in 1949.
books.name: KISS CARLO

books.author: by Mike Maden
books.description: Jack Ryan Jr. helps thwart a global financial crisis. (Tom Clancy died in 2013.)
books.name: TOM CLANCY: POINT OF CONTACT

books.author: by Martha Hall Kelly
books.description: A story of three women’s lives during and after World War II.
books.name: LILAC GIRLS

books.author: by Don Winslow
books.description: A detective sergeant and his crew in Manhattan North deal with gangs, drugs and guns, and steal millions of dollars while they're at it.
books.name: THE FORCE

books.author: by Fredrik Backman
books.description: A curmudgeon's gruff exterior masks a generosity of spirit. Originally published in Sweden in 2014.
books.name: A MAN CALLED OVE
